name: Blackout Time Parser
description: Listens to Telegram channel posts, extracts blackout schedules with LLMs, and toggles a Home Assistant switch.

options.telegram_session: Telegram user session string generated via GramJS/Telethon script.
options.telegram_channel: Channel username (without @) or numeric id to listen to.
options.switch_entity: Home Assistant switch entity to control.
options.timezone: Timezone used to interpret dates/times in posts (e.g. Europe/Kyiv).
options.message_hint: Optional hint/prefix phrase to help the LLM focus on the right line.
options.provider: LLM provider to use: openai, claude, ollama, or auto (default ollama).
options.loop_seconds: How often to evaluate and call the switch service (seconds, default 60).
options.on_lead_seconds: Seconds before range start to switch ON (default 60).
options.off_delay_seconds: Seconds after range start to switch OFF (default 3600 = 1h).
